docs.title: Model Cards Become Standard in Finance
docs.snippet: Banks adopt unified model cards and documentation workflows to meet new oversight checklists for AI explainability and bias monitoring.

docs.title: Transparency Benchmarks for AI
docs.snippet: Regulators align on minimum disclosure: dataset statements, incident logs, and quarterly fairness evaluations for critical AI deployments.

docs.title: Retail A/B Tests AI Copy Generation
docs.snippet: Large retailers run controlled experiments with generative copy, enforcing human review for tone and compliance across markets.

docs.title: Healthcare Risk Controls for Triage Models
docs.snippet: Hospitals add escalation rules and audit trails to triage assistants, reducing wait times while documenting edge-case handling.

docs.title: EU Registry Proposal for High-Impact AI
docs.snippet: Draft law would register high-impact AI providers and require publishing evaluation summaries and remediation timelines for incidents.
